product_description: SAS150 is a suspended metal ceiling system with clip-in modular tiles and concealed grid.
standard_dimensions: STANDARD MODULE SIZES (MM) WITH 4MM BEVEL TILES  300 x 300 | 300 x 600 | 300 x 900 | 300 x 1200 | 300 x 1500  500 x 500
recycled_content_description: It is assumed that as the main element of the product is steel and a valuable material, 100% of the product is recycled at end of life.
reusable_description: SAS metal ceiling systems are design for disassembly and reuse
factory_finished_description: Standard Finishes - Coating Polyester powder coat
type_of_packaging: Timber, cardboard and paper - all suitable for reuse or recycling

product_description: SAS200 is a suspended metal ceiling system with metal panels that are supported by a concealed grid
standard_dimensions: There are no standard tile sizes for SAS200. Tiles can be up to 3000mm in length and no less than 300mm wide.
recyclable_offcuts_description: It is assumed that as the main element of the product is steel and a valuable material, 100% of the product is recycled at end of life.
recycled_content_description: It is assumed that as the main element of the product is steel and a valuable material, 100% of the product is recycled at end of life.
reusable_description: SAS Suspension systems allow for easy panel removability and reuse. Panel durability assists in reuse.
minimisation_design_strategy: The majority of waste minimize occurs in ceiling panel set-out and detailing. This is best discussed with your representative to coordinate specific ceiling details that limit how many panels need to be cut on-site to suit specific project conditions.
factory_finished_description: Standard Finishes - Coating Polyester Powder Coat
type_of_packaging: Timber, cardboard and paper - all suitable for reuse or recycling
